item.title: Prepare to run a domain
item.description: Perform these steps to prepare your Kubernetes cluster to run a WebLogic domain: Create the domain namespace or namespaces. One or more domains can share a namespace. A single instance of the operator can manage multiple namespaces. $ kubectl create namespace domain-namespace-1 Replace domain-namespace-1 with name you want to use. The name must follow standard Kubernetes naming conventions, that is, lowercase, numbers, and hyphens. Create a Kubernetes Secret containing the Administration Server boot credentials.
